name: Sea Battle: Fleet battle game
description:
Command your own fleet as in the classic Sea Battle game! Use strategy to sink the ships of the computer or your friends!

FEATURES

- Play Sea Battle against your friends
- Play Sea Battle against the computer
- Timeless gameplay
- Blueprint design
- FREE game

CONTACT
